languages.text: {n}На мостике царит шумный беспорядок. Молитвы техноматов смешиваются в бестолковую какофонию, сервиторы поспешно скалывают с деталей варп-двигателя корку из застывшей священной смазки. Посреди этого хаоса застыл Паскаль, сжимающий инфопластину и будто отрешившийся от происходящего.{/n}

{n}The bridge is in upheaval. The technomats' prayers mix together in a senseless cacophony while servitors work hastily to remove a hardened crust of sacred unguents from the warp engine's components. In the middle of all this tumult stands Pasqal with a data-slate clutched in his hands, seemingly disconnected from the flurry of activity around him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На мостике царит шумный беспорядок. Молитвы техноматов смешиваются в бестолковую какофонию, сервиторы поспешно скалывают с деталей варп-двигателя корку из застывшей священной смазки. Посреди этого хаоса застыл Паскаль, сжимающий инфопластину и будто отрешившийся от происходящего.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The bridge is in upheaval. The technomats' prayers mix together into a pointless cacophony, the servitors are hastily removing a crust of sacred unguents from parts of the warp engine system. In the middle of all this tumult stands Pasqal with a data-slate clutched in his hands, seemingly disconnected from the surrounding reality.{/n}

In the middle of all this tumult stands Pasqal with a data-slate clutched in his hands, seemingly disconnected from the surrounding reality.{/n}

In the middle of all this tumult stands Pasqal with a data-slate clutched in his hands, seemingly disconnected from the flurry of activity around him.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Brücke ist in Aufruhr. Die Gebete der Technomaten überlagern sich zu einer sinnlosen Kakophonie, während Servitoren hastig an der Entfernung verkrusteter heiliger Salben aus den Komponenten des Warpantriebs arbeiten. Inmitten dieses Tumults steht Pasqal mit einem Datablock in seinen Händen und scheint von dem wilden Treiben um sich herum nichts mitzubekommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is in upheaval. The technomats' prayers mix together in a senseless cacophony while servitors work hastily to remove a hardened crust of sacred unguents from the warp engine's components. In the middle of all this tumult stands Pasqal with a data-slate clutched in his hands, seemingly disconnected from the flurry of activity around him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Brücke ist in Aufruhr. Die Gebete der Technomaten überlagern sich zu einer sinnlosen Kakophonie, während Servitoren hastig an der Entfernung verkrusteter heiliger Salben aus den Komponenten des Warpantriebs arbeiten. Inmitten dieses Tumults steht Pasqal mit einem Datablock in seinen Händen und scheint von dem wilden Treiben um sich herum nichts mitzubekommen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'agitation règne sur la passerelle. Les prières des technomates se mêlent en une cacophonie insensée, tandis que des servitors s'activent pour retirer une croûte durcie d'onguents sacrés des composants du moteur Warp. Au milieu de tout ce tumulte se tient Pasqal, une plaque de données à la main, apparemment déconnecté de l'activité intense autour de lui.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is in upheaval. The technomats' prayers mix together in a senseless cacophony while servitors work hastily to remove a hardened crust of sacred unguents from the warp engine's components. In the middle of all this tumult stands Pasqal with a data-slate clutched in his hands, seemingly disconnected from the flurry of activity around him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'agitation règne sur la passerelle. Les prières des technomates se mêlent en une cacophonie insensée, tandis que des servitors s'activent pour retirer une croûte durcie d'onguents sacrés des composants du moteur Warp. Au milieu de tout ce tumulte se tient Pasqal, une plaque de données à la main, apparemment déconnecté de l'activité intense autour de lui.{/n}

languages.text: {n}舰桥一片混乱，技工们的祈祷毫无意义地混杂在一起，机仆匆匆忙忙地清理亚空间引擎部件上的神圣机油硬壳。帕斯卡站在这一片混乱之中，手里拿着一块数据板，似乎与周围纷乱的现实世界脱了节。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is in upheaval. The technomats' prayers mix together in a senseless cacophony while servitors work hastily to remove a hardened crust of sacred unguents from the warp engine's components. In the middle of all this tumult stands Pasqal with a data-slate clutched in his hands, seemingly disconnected from the flurry of activity around him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}舰桥一片混乱，技工们的祈祷毫无意义地混杂在一起，奴工匆匆忙忙地清理亚空间引擎部件上的神圣机油硬壳。帕斯卡站在这一片混乱之中，手里拿着一块数据板，似乎与周围纷乱的现实世界脱了节。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ブリッジは大騒ぎだった。テクノマットの祈祷は意味のない不協和音となり、サーヴィターはワープエンジン部品からの聖なる軟膏の硬い表皮を慌てて取り除こうとしている。この喧騒の真ん中に立つパスカルは手にしっかりとデータスレートを握っており、彼を取り巻く混乱からは浮いているようである。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is in upheaval. The technomats' prayers mix together in a senseless cacophony while servitors work hastily to remove a hardened crust of sacred unguents from the warp engine's components. In the middle of all this tumult stands Pasqal with a data-slate clutched in his hands, seemingly disconnected from the flurry of activity around him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ブリッジは大騒ぎだった。テクノマットの祈祷は意味のない不協和音となり、サーヴィターは<歪み>のエンジン部品からの聖なる軟膏の硬い表皮を慌てて取り除こうとしている。この喧騒の真ん中に立つパスカルは手にしっかりとデータスレートを握っており、彼を取り巻く混乱からは浮いているようである。{/n}
{n}ブリッジは大騒ぎだった。テクノマットの祈祷は意味のない不協和音となり、サーヴィターはワープエンジン部品からの聖なる軟膏の硬い表皮を慌てて取り除こうとしている。この喧騒の真ん中に立つパスカルは手にしっかりとデータスレートを握っており、彼を取り巻く混乱からは浮いているようである。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El puente está agitado. Las plegarias de los tecnómatas se mezclan en una cacofonía sin sentido, los sirvientes retiran apresuradamente una costra de ungüentos sagrados de los componentes del motor de disformidad. En medio de todo este tumulto se encuentra Pasqal sujetando una tablilla de datos, aparentemente desconectado de la realidad circundante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is in upheaval. The technomats' prayers mix together in a senseless cacophony while servitors work hastily to remove a hardened crust of sacred unguents from the warp engine's components. In the middle of all this tumult stands Pasqal with a data-slate clutched in his hands, seemingly disconnected from the flurry of activity around him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El puente está agitado. Las plegarias de los tecnómatas se mezclan en una cacofonía sin sentido, los sirvientes retiran apresuradamente una costra de ungüentos sagrados de los componentes del motor de la disformidad. En medio de todo este tumulto se encuentra Pasqal sujetando una tablilla de datos, aparentemente desconectado de la realidad circundante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Köprüye bir kargaşa hâkim. Teknomatların duaları birbirine karışıp anlamsız bir kakofoni oluştururken hizmetörler, öteboyut motorunun bileşenlerinin üstünde katılaşıp katman oluşturmuş kutsal özyağları telaşla kazımaya çalışıyor. Tüm bu hengâmenin ortasında da Pasqal, ellerinde bir databela ile etrafında vuku bulan koşuşturmacaya aldırış etmez bir hâlde duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is in upheaval. The technomats' prayers mix together in a senseless cacophony while servitors work hastily to remove a hardened crust of sacred unguents from the warp engine's components. In the middle of all this tumult stands Pasqal with a data-slate clutched in his hands, seemingly disconnected from the flurry of activity around him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Köprü kargaşa içinde. Teknomatonların dualarıyla seçilmesi imkânsız konuşma sesleri birbirine karışıyor, bu sırada da servitörler öteboyut motorunun bileşenlerindeki kutsal merhemlerin sertleşmiş kabuğunu hızla kazımaya çalışıyor. Bu arbedenin ortasında da ellerindeki databela ile Pasqal, etrafında vuku bulan telaşeye aldırış etmez bir hâlde duruyor.{/n}
